title: Desus and Mero Interview "Spice, Beige Rage and Apologies"
itunes:title: Desus and Mero Interview "Spice, Beige Rage and Apologies"
description:
Thursday 3/15- The word of the day was "spicy" because that is all The Breakfast Club was about today, mixed in with some beige rage and apologies. Desus and Mero stopped by and DJ Envy did not waste anytime unleashing his beige rage when confronting them about their comments towards his wife. But even that didn't stop the jokes from coming. In fact it brought such an impact that we went to "Breakfast Club Court" and asked our listeners if Dj Envy overreacted. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Morgan Roof the Charleston Church shooter's sister for bringing a weapon and marijuana to school.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
